name: Bitcoin Base
description: Bitcoin Base (BTCB) is a memecoin launched on the Base network. The project is designed to represent a playful, community-driven version of Bitcoin within the Base ecosystem. It mirrors Bitcoinâ€™s original total supply of 21,000,000 tokens, but does not aim to replicate its technology or functionality. Bitcoin Base serves primarily as a community token with no inherent utility beyond its memecoin identity.
